title: COVID survivors at increased risk of long-term gastrointestinal conditions
description: Although people with severe COVID had highest risk, mild cases also upped risks.

title: Nvidia driver bug might make your CPU work harder after you close your game
description: A driver hotfix, available via an 850MB download, will fix the problem for you.

title: A more powerful Steam Deck is “a few years” off, Valve says
description: Valve sees value in keeping "a solid [hardware] target throughout the generation."

title: Starlink explains why its FCC map listings are so different from reality
description: Starlink filings lump RV and home service together; SpaceX blames FCC system.

title: Wikipedia + AI = truth? DuckDuckGo hopes so with new answerbot
description: DuckAssist provides an AI-powered Wikipedia summary, hoping to avoid hallucinations.

title: Remember that ancient Roman “dildo”? It might just be an old Roman drop spindle
description: "It’s a bit understated as a dildo, and would make for a more satisfying spin than anything else."

title: Room-temperature superconductor works at lower pressures
description: Results come from a lab that had an earlier superconductivity paper retracted.

title: Musk apologizes for mocking and firing Twitter exec with muscular dystrophy
description: Musk says Halli Thorleifsson “is considering remaining at Twitter.”

title: Dealmaster: Lenovo’s best laptop is 50% off in latest doorbuster deal
description: We've got big discounts on Lenovo's business laptop.

title: Bethesda’s Starfield pushed back to Sept. 6 launch date
description: "We know you've waited a long time to play something new from us," says director.

title: Relativity Space will attempt to become a real rocket company today
description: Relativity Space is one of the more intriguing new space launch companies.

title: Tesla under new federal investigation for steering wheels that detach
description: Both vehicles suffered the problem after incomplete repairs during production.

title: Ryzen 7950X3D review: An expensive but incredibly efficient 16-core CPU
description: AMD's second run at a 3D V-Cache CPU is easier to recommend than the first.

title: EU tells Elon Musk to hire more staff to moderate Twitter
description: Regulators are concerned that platform aims to use more volunteers and AI for moderation.

title: NASA studying unexpected performance of Orion’s heat shield ahead of crew mission
description: "Vigilance is very important for us as we fly crew going forward."

title: VW says sorry for child carjacking fiasco, makes safety service free
description: From June 1, most model-year 2020-2023 VWs can sign up for five free years.
